metadata.dc:author: Ortiz Cabria, R
Garciá Cobo, E
Adriazola Semino, M
Blanco Parra, M A
Tejeda Bañez, E
Romero Rodríguez, F
metadata.dc:description: Presentation of one case of penis-located multiple skin metastasis from prostate adenocarcinoma after hormonal blockade for 11 years. Revision and update of the topic, corroborating the poor prognosis of these patients.
metadata.dc:title: Lesiones cutáneas de pene. Metástasis de adenocarcinoma de próstata. Aportación de un caso.
[Skin lesions of the penis. Prostatic adenocarcinoma metastasis. Report of a case].
